backend/main.mo: Defines transaction types, balances, daily stats, opening balances, and access control logic, storing transactions and user profiles with utilities for comparison and role management.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records describing feature IDs, affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten one‑sentence summaries for multiple frontend source files across the application.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML wrapper that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Manages PIN authentication, initialization, and routing between auth screen and dashboard, clearing React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/BackupRestore.ts: UI component for exporting and importing JSON backups with success/error alerts, collapsible sections, and file handling.
frontend/src/components/BalanceCards.tsx: Displays financial overview cards using balance and stats queries, with loading/error states and navigation to Add Transaction.
frontend/src/components/DailyTracking.ts: Empty or placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/DaywiseTransacti: Displays transactions for a selected day, allows editing daily deductions, and filters data from all transactions using local storage and query hooks.
frontend/src/components/EditTransactionD: Provides a dialog to edit a transaction’s type, amount, description, and date, submitting updates via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/FilterTransactio: Filters transactions by date range, computes summary stats, and reacts to query cache updates while using local storage as fallback.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows the app header with logout, backup, restore, and data-clear controls depending on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyTransacti: Filters transactions by month and type, shows totals, and displays results in a table with formatted values.
frontend/src/components/OpeningBalancesF: Form to view, create, or update opening balances with date selection, loading state, and success handling.
frontend/src/components/PinAuth.tsx: PIN setup and authentication component with support for verification, confirmation, reset, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user for their name and saving it via a profile API call.
Form for adding transactions with type selection, amount input, date picking, and success feedback.
frontend/src/components/TransactionHisto: Displays all transactions with filtering, editing, deletion, and merged derived rows.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hook for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePinAuth.ts: Provides PIN-based local authentication with hashing, session restore, setup, verification, logout, and reset helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks and local‑storage helpers for transactions, balances, user data, deductions, and opening balances.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining theme variables, gradients, component overrides, and calendar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with tabbed navigation for overview, transactions, filtering, and reports.
frontend/src/utils/derivedTransactions.t: Generates derived transaction rows (10% savings, cheeti deductions), normalizes dates, and merges them with real transactions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and container settings with plugin support.
project_state.json: JSON document tracking project state, feature requirements, known issues, and the goal of displaying derived savings and cheeti deduction rows.
